column4: I've done a server install of Ubuntu, then installed the xubuntu-desktop package. I'm having problems getting my iPod to be recognised ... what packages should I install / modules should I modprobe?
If you want ipod goodness, use gnome
I got an ipod nano yesterday and was surprised when it worked perfectly in gnome
yeah I had it working on the default breezy install, I found gnome too slow though :/ thx anyhow
